comment.body: @Styromaniac:  I think most human beings are prone to build various kinds of walls and tags to keep themselves in a 'safe zone'.and the walls eventually become prisons and cages.And the tags are now their chains.So much prejudice,ignorance and stupidity.All those obessions in trying to keep 'sanity' and certainty are futile.Many people hates the things that different from them and refuse to try to understand them.many people are either too lazy or too self-centered to learn about the 'weird' stuffs.So they resort to the simplest method to treat those.To refuse,to despise,and to hate.If you ever try break their chains and walls,they may just kill you.
